subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees decided to put Andy Pettitte on the disabled list with back stiffness, meaning they will carry an eight-man bullpen until activating Pettitte for the fifth game of the season.
snippet: The Yankees decided to put Andy Pettitte on the disabled list with back stiffness, meaning they will carry an eight-man bullpen until activating Pettitte for the fifth game of the season.
